trans-unit.source: The type of the exported value.
trans-unit.target: 导出值的类型。

trans-unit.source: Holds an exported value created by an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" /> object and a reference to a method to release that object.
trans-unit.target: 保存 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" /> 对象所创建的某个导出值和对方法的引用，以释放该对象。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: The exported value.
trans-unit.target: 导出的值。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a method to release the object.
trans-unit.target: 对用于释放对象的方法的引用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext`1" /> class, including its associated export.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext`1" /> 类的当前实例占用的所有资源，包括其关联导出。

trans-unit.source: Calling the `Dispose` method of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601> object calls the referenced method to release its associated export.
trans-unit.target: 调用`Dispose`方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601>对象调用所引用的方法来释放其关联的导出。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601>。

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 方法使 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=187455) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=187456).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=187455)和[实现 Dispose 方法](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=187456)。

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportLifetimeContext%601> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exported value of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取导出 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" /> 对象的导出值。

trans-unit.source: The exported value.
trans-unit.target: 导出的值。
